page.title: 10Housing
page.content: We surveyed the housing in the area and found that{55% of people owned {their houses,37% rented theirs and 8% {lived in a tied cottage.}Most people owning their own house were retired and had not been born in the village but had recently moved in. {47%}of the houses were made of{ {re-constituted stone,14%}were built in{wood,37%}were built of{natural {Cotswold Stone}and{2%}were built of{ {brick.} There has been lttle{building}in the area as it is an area of outstanding beauty and as such is protected from any building that is not purely filling a space between other houses .
